mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT_ABANDONED_ANIMALS( dclrAbnd_idx, dclrAbnd_loc, dclrAbnd_title, dclrAbnd_content , dclrAbnd_photo, dclrAbnd_regdate, dclrAbnd_stts, member_idx ) VALUES( SEQ_REPORT_idx.nextval, #{dclrAbnd_loc}, #{dclrAbnd_title}, #{dclrAbnd_content} , #{dclrAbnd_photo}, sysdate, 'reg', #{member_idx})
